com.adyen.threeds2.customization

Class Customization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adyen.threeds2.customization.Customization
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ButtonCustomization, ExpandableInfoCustomization, LabelCustomization, ScreenCustomization, SelectionItemCustomization, TextBoxCustomization, ToolbarCustomization

    public class Customization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as a superclass for the specific customization classes.

    Created by Ran Haveshush on 24/08/2018.
